description:
Alpine Minimalism: Whether on Icy North Faces, on Stormy Ascents or During Severe Snowfall on a Summit
– the 3l Ortler Jacket and Pants Are Our Lightweights for Alpinists! For the Merino Naked
Sheep Line We Concentrated on the Essentials: Light Weight. Protection and Comfort. Products
In This Line Are Lightweight and Technically Sophisticated, Yet Robust and Comfortable. We Have Consistently
Streamlined the Design and Features Down to the Essentials to Ensure the Line Functions in Demanding
Terrain. Merino Wool is Used in Specific Areas to Increase Comfort. The Dermizax® Nx Membrane From
Toray – the Most High-performance Membrane That We Use – Ensures the Jacket is Breathable,
Windproof and Waterproof. The Merino Naked Sheep Line is Also Completely Pfc-free in the Interests
Of Sustainability.
name: Ortovox 3L Ortler Jacket - Mens
